updates.text: NEL is back to regular svc. Free bus rides have ceased. we are very sorry.
To assist with your journey, free bus rides available at designated bus stops near affected NEL stns.Bridging buses also activated.
NEL delay - To assist with your journey,free bus rides available at designated bus stops near affected  stns.Bridging buses also activated.
NEL delay -To assist with your journey,free bus rides available at designated bus stops near affected stns.Bridging buses also activated.
NEL svc is delayed due to a signalling fault. Additional travel time of about 20 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
